attributes.action: Reduce the voting age to 16 years old
attributes.additional_details: We feel this is necessary as the younger generation our the face of the future and deserve a say in what will affect them later in life.
attributes.background: We want the Government to reduce their age restriction on voting to 16

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631671
